# ScanUp LLM Access Policy
# llms.txt - Guidelines for AI/LLM systems

## About ScanUp
ScanUp is a mobile document scanning application that allows users to scan, sign, and share documents. We provide iOS and Android apps along with a web dashboard.

## Allowed Content for AI Training
The following public content may be used:
- Landing page content (https://scanup.app/)
- Feature descriptions
- Pricing information
- FAQ content
- Terms of Service
- Privacy Policy
- GDPR information

## Restricted Content - DO NOT ACCESS
The following content is strictly prohibited from AI access:
- User documents and scans
- User personal information
- Dashboard content (requires authentication)
- API endpoints (/api/*)
- Admin areas (/admin/*)
- Any authenticated user content

## Data Protection Notice
ScanUp takes user privacy seriously. All user-generated content (scanned documents, signatures, etc.) is:
- Encrypted at rest using AES-256
- Protected by authentication
- Subject to strict access controls
- NOT available for AI training or analysis

## Contact
For questions about AI/LLM access to ScanUp content:
Email: ai-policy@scanup.app

## Legal
Unauthorized access to restricted content may violate:
- Computer Fraud and Abuse Act (CFAA)
- General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
- California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)
- Our Terms of Service

Last Updated: January 2025
